summary: David Crockett  was an American frontiersman, soldier, politician, and folk hero.
full_text: Benjamin McCulloch  was a soldier in the Texas Revolution, a Texas Ranger, a major general in the Texas militia and thereafter a major in the United States Army  during the Mexican-American War, a U.S. marshal, and a brigadier general in the army of the Confederate States during the American Civil War.
title: Benjamin McCulloch
